src:
Data dan Fakta Serie A: Bologna vs Inter Milan
01 Nov 2019, 16:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Peringkat 2 Inter Milan akan main tandang melawan peringkat 10 Bologna pada pekan ke-11 Serie A 2019/20, Minggu (03/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Stadio Renato Dall'Ara ini.
Dalam laga tandangnya melawan Bologna di Serie A musim lalu, pada pekan ke-3, Inter menang 3-0 melalui gol-gol Radja Nainggolan menit 66, Antonio Candreva menit 82, dan Ivan Perisic menit 84.
Musim lalu, ketika ganti menjamu Bologna pada pekan ke-22, Inter dipaksa menyerah 0-1 oleh gol tunggal Federico Santander menit 32.
Inter cuma kalah 1 kali dalam 11 laga terakhirnya melawan Bologna di semua kompetisi, kandang dan tandang (M6 S4 K1).
Inter tak terkalahkan dalam 14 laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Bologna di semua kompetisi (M11 S3 K0).
Inter cuma 3 kali clean sheet dalam 8 laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Bologna di Serie A.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Serie A Data and Facts: Bologna vs Inter Milan
Nov 01 2019, 16:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rank 2 Inter Milan will play away to 10th place in Bologna in Week 11 of Serie A 2019/20, Sunday (11/03/2019). Here are some data and facts behind the match at the Stadio Renato Dall'Ara.
In their away game against Bologna in Serie A last season, in Week 3, Inter won 3-0 through goals from Radja Nainggolan in the 66th minute, Antonio Candreva in the 82nd minute, and Ivan Perisic in the 84th minute.
Last season, when substituting Bologna for the 22nd week, Inter were forced to give up 0-1 by a single goal by Federico Santander in the 32nd minute.
Inter have only lost 1 of their last 11 matches against Bologna in all competitions, home and away (M6 S4 K1).
Inter are unbeaten in their last 14 away games against Bologna in all competitions (M11 S3 K0).
Inter have only had three clean sheets in their last 8 away games against Bologna in Serie A.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
